EmailTemplate.description: Sent to Field Sales Managers with a participant in Onboarding
EmailTemplate.name: 03. Field Sales Manager Coaching Program Intro
EmailTemplate.subject: Put me in Coach, I'm ready!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Guidance along the Learning Journey
Congratulations, your Regional Sales Manager has completed Sales Onboarding! This is an important milestone on the Learning Journey with WEX.
Now with your help and coaching, they can be successful in the field. The Field Sales Manager Coaching Program will help sales professionals fully ramp as soon as possible.
For information and expectations of this program, select the link below: https://na64.salesforce.com/sfc/p/700000009EOI/a/700000005UfE/NmHUJl7ywLdMwM_FtD69TWTrnJT2qEgphnUt_xHucmY
Please email SalesTraining@wexinc.com with any questions.
Thank You, WEX Global Sales Training
